hero.title: Transforming ideas into reality with code
hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer specialized in creating beautiful and functional web experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with a keen eye for design and a commitment to creating seamless user experiences.
about.description2: When I am not writing code, I am working with new tools or technologies or contributing to open-source or even with the community of developers.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work. Each project is unique and solves specific challenges.
projects.gymAppDescription: The GymApp is a web application currently in development, designed to connect gym members with their personal trainers. The system aims to improve communication, automate processes, and simplify routines, providing a more efficient experience for both parties. With JWT authentication and a responsive interface, the project seeks to optimize the management of training plans and fitness activities in a practical and intuitive way.
projects.weatherDashboardDescription: The Weather Dashboard is a web application designed to provide users with real-time weather information for their selected location. It features a clean and intuitive interface, allowing users to search for a city and view current weather conditions, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and forecast data. Built with modern web technologies, this project integrates a weather API to fetch and display accurate weather updates. The responsive design ensures usability across various devices, making it easy for users to plan their day based on weather insights.
projects.cineScopeDescription: CineScope is a web application that displays a collection of movies with their details and allows users to like or comment on a particular movie. By consuming the TMDb API for movie data and the Involvement API for user interactions, the platform offers a seamless and engaging experience for movie enthusiasts. Currently, this is a demo version of the project, and future updates are planned to add more features.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a proposal for a selection process or a project in mind? Let's collaborate to bring your vision to life.
